oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Study of Heisenberg ferrimagnets using a constant coupling method for a cluster
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GOVEAS, N
MUKHOPADHYAY, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study here the magnetization, heat capacity and susceptibility of Heisenberg ferrimagnets using a mean field theory for a cluster by combining the basic ideas of Bethe-Peierls-Weiss (BPW) and constant coupling (CC) method for a pair. This method removes the defects of the BPW or CC methods, giving accurate results.
